title: Liang Fu Wan
cleaned_text: | | | | | | Liang Fu Wan From "Zang Fu Syndromes," by McDonald and Penner English: Galangal and Pill pain and disperses stagnant Qi. | With Xiang Fu, for Cold epigastric pain. |Rz. Cyperi||Xiang Fu||10-15g||Regulates movement and Alleviates pain. ST Cold LIV Qi Stagnation with Cold Accumulation | Epigastric pain (better with warmth) | Lack of thirst Painful menstruation | Stifling sensation in the chest | Likes to drink warm fluids Hypochondriac pain T; Pink C: White P: Wiry and tight or Deep and slow |Chronic gastritis||Peptic, gastric and duodenal ulcer| | | For more severe Cold: + More Rz. Alpiniae Offic. | | For more severe Qi Stagnation: + More Rz. Cyperi Xiang Fu | | For menstruation: + Rx.
